name: react-bond
description: react-bond is a library for building cross-platform lightweight desktop apps with the React.

scripts.test:create-app: npm run build:scripts && rm -f -r ../test-create-react-bond-app && node lib/scripts/createApp.js ../test-create-react-bond-app
scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && npm run build:copy-types && tsc src/index.ts --outDir lib --target es2020 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop true --jsx react --sourceMap true --declaration true
scripts.build:scripts: tsc src/scripts/hot.ts src/scripts/build.ts src/scripts/createApp.ts --outDir lib/scripts --noImplicitUseStrict --target es2020 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop true

author: Filip Paul≈Ø
